ABOUT.company: This application is designed, built and maintained by [Restaurant Developments Ltd]({{ web }}) © {{ year }}.

core.msgDataChange:
Thank you.  

We have received your change request and this will be reviewed by the curation
team and updated accordingly.  

Please be aware that you may not see any changes for up to 24 hours.

spw.headerContentRequired: We need a bit more content
spw.msgContentRequired:
Good work so far but we need a bit more information to generate your  Website. 

The summary below should indicate which sections still need additional content. Once you've added enough data, the **PREVIEW** and **PUBLISH** options will be enabled and we can create your website and distribute your content to our partners.

You can [view a demo restaurant version]({{ link }}) top see what the website will look like with content added.
spw.msgPublished: Your **apptiser** website has been successfully published and the latest content updates synchronised accross the RDL Network of distribution channels.
spw.msgUnpublished: The latest changes that you have made have not yet been published. Go to your [WEBSITE SETTING](cms/{{ id }}/settings) to PREVIEW and PUBLISH your latest updates.
spw.msgVerified: # Website published on {{ date }} by {{ name }}.
spw.tipViewPublished: View the apptiser website of {{ restaurant }}

summary.statusMenus: {{ pdf }} active pdf menus & {{ dish }} sample dishes

FEATURES.labelDescFull: A full description up to {{ chars }} characters max.
FEATURES.labelDescParagraph: A one paragraph description, 200 characters max.
FEATURES.labelDescSentence: A one sentence description {{ chars }} characters max.
FEATURES.labelStrapline: Strapline (e.g. Restaurant & Bar) {{ chars }} characters maximum
FEATURES.tipAddFeatures: Add extra features here, separated by commas

HOURS.labelGeneral: Add general information about you opening times ({{ chars }} characters max)

IMAGES.msgConfirmDelete: You are about to delete **image {{ img }}**,  are you sure that you want to do that?
IMAGES.msgDefaultUpdated: The default image has been successfully updated
IMAGES.msgDeleted: Image {{ img }} has now been deleted

LINKS.infoCustomDomain:
Your **apptiser** website can be served from a custom domain (e.g. www.your-domain.com). 

This can be an existing domain name, or we can register a suitable domain name for you. Contact the [Curation Team](mailto:{{ email }}) for further details.
LINKS.infoQRCodes:
**QR Codes** are special images that carry information about a website venue.

Most modern smartphones will recognise and decode these images, via their camera apps, and allow the use to visit the relevant web page directly.
LINKS.infoSpwLink: The website link, or URL, above is a permanent link to your **apptiser** website. This link can be shared with customers or partners via any digital medium.
LINKS.infoUsage:
Use these links in any 'offline' situation to provide an easy way for your customers to access the website, or menus, on their smart device. 

You can copy the QR code to your computer using right-click or long-press on the image if using a smartphone or tablet.
LINKS.tipOpenSpw: Open your website in new window
LINKS.tipQRCodeMenu: Download the MENU QR Code for {{ name }} to provide users with a link to your Menu section.
LINKS.tipQRCodeWebsite: Download the QR Code for {{ name }} to provide users with a link to your website.

LOCATION.infoDirectionsDownload: If you have a PDF map, or directions then you can make it available to your customers by uploading a copy here.
LOCATION.labelParking: Any parking available nearby ({{ chars }} characters max.)
LOCATION.labelPublicTransport: Trains, buses, stations etc.({{ chars }} characters max.)
LOCATION.msgNewCoords: Coordinates updated to latitude: {{ lat }} and longitude {{ lng }}.

MENUS.hintSection: For example Starters, Main Course, Lunch, Drinks, etc.
MENUS.infoSampleDishes:
Add a selection of your most popular dishes. We would recommend that you choose a cross-section of your price range and dishes that best reflect your style of food. You can display the dishes as 
![Vegetarian]({{ icon.veg }}) **Vegetarian**, 
![Vegan]({{ icon.vegan }}) **Vegan** or 
![Gluten Free]({{ icon.gluten }}) **Gluten Free** when you add them.
MENUS.labelMenuGenInfo: Add any general information about the menus ({{ max }} characters max.)
MENUS.msgConfirmDeleteMenu: You are about to delete the PDF menu **{{ item }}** – are you sure that's what you want to do?
MENUS.msgRemoveFromMenu: You are about to delete **{{ item }}** from the menu, is that what you want to do?
MENUS.msgRemovedFromMenu: {{ item }} has been deleted from the menu

RESERVATIONS.labelGeneral: General information about reservations ({{ chars }} characters max.)
RESERVATIONS.labelGroupPolicy: What is your policy regarding group bookings (max. {{ max }} characters)?
RESERVATIONS.labelPrivate: Do you offer any event catering or private dining options (max. {{ max }} characters) ?
RESERVATIONS.msgNoOnlineBookings: Please ensure that you complete the **General** information section, giving details of how customers can book in advance, outlining your policy regarding reservations and including any special telephone numbers etc.
RESERVATIONS.msgNoTest: This service does not require testing - it does not have an associated URL

builder.infoDiscardChanges:
You've made changes to your **apptiser website** configuration, but have not yet published those changes.

If you continue without **publishing** those changes, then they will be discarded.

**Note**: content changes that you may have made in this session will not be affected.

SETTINGS.infoConfig: You can exclude any of the following sections from your website by using the options below. You will need to republish your website for any changes to take effect.
SETTINGS.infoDomains: Your website can be published to an existing domain name that you own, or to a newly registered domain. Use the option below to get started.
SETTINGS.infoUnpublished:
**The latest changes that you have made have not yet been published.**
**PREVIEW** your website to check any changes you've made then, if everything is correct, **PUBLISH** your website and synchronise content on all **{{ brand }}** distribution channels.

UPLOAD.errorExceedsMax: That file exceeds the maximum size that can be uploaded.
UPLOAD.infoImages: Images must be .jpg or .jpeg files and not exceed 5mb in size. Landscape format (i.e. wider than they are tall) will work best.

CONFIRM.msgConfirmCancel: The changes you have made have not yet been saved and will be lost if you continue. Do you want to discard changes and continue?

CONTACT.labelHint: Type your message to our support team here...
CONTACT.noText: You have not typed a message yet...
CONTACT.txtBody1: If you are experiencing problems or need some help with using our application, please let us know.
CONTACT.txtBody2: Enter a brief description in the box below and click **send email** - we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

ERRORS.failedToCreateFreeMember: We were unable to create your free account at this time. Please try again in a few moments. Our support team have been notified.
ERRORS.failedToLoadAssociatedRestaurants: We were unable load your associated venues at this time. Please try again in a few moments. Our support team have been notified.
ERRORS.failedToSendRecoveryEmail: We were unable to send your password recovery email. Please contact our support team for further assistance, they have been notified.
ERRORS.failedToSendSupportEmail: We were unable to send your support request email at this time. Please try again in a few moments. Our support team have been notified.
ERRORS.failedToSendVerificationEmail: We were to unable send your verification email at this time. Please try again in a few moments. Our support team have been notified.
ERRORS.failedToSetSession: We were unable to store some cookies in your browser, so we are unable to log you in at this time. Please try again in a few moments. Our support team have been notified.
ERRORS.failedToUpdateRestaurantEmail: We were unable to update the email for your venue at this time. Please try again in a few moments. Our support team have been notified.
ERRORS.invalidServerResponse: Our server returned an error, so we are unable to log you in at this time. Please try again in a few moments. Our support team have been notified.
ERRORS.noServerResponse: Our server has stopped responding, so we are unable to log you in at this time. Your internet connection looks stable, so please try again in a few moments. Our support team have been notified.
ERRORS.unableToAddAssociation: We were unable to associate your venue at this time. Please try again in a few moments. Our support team have been notified.
ERRORS.unableToLookupRestaurants: We are unable look for venue at this time. Please try again in a few moments. Our support team have been notified.

JOIN.invalidTerms: To continue, you must tick the box to confirm acceptance of the {{ brand }} **terms** and **privacy policy** and to allow us to contact you, if necessary, regarding Membership.
JOIN.joinSuccess:
# Ok thanks!

A member of our Support & Curation Team will be in contact with you shortly.

**{{ brand }} Curation Team**
JOIN.joinUsByReferral:
# Welcome

You've been invited to subscribe to **{{ brand }}**, an easy to use, fuss-free website solution created specifically for hospitality businesses. 

Please enter your contact details and indicate that you accept our terms.

If you experience any problems activating your membership then do please [contact our Support Team]({{ email }}).
JOIN.joinUsByReferralFree:
# Free Subscription!

You've been invited to become a subscriber of **{{ brand }}**, an easy to use, fuss-free website solution created specifically for hospitality businesses. 

Please enter your contact details and indicate that you accept our terms.

If you experience any problems activating your membership then do please [contact our Support Team]({{ email }}).

Still unsure? [Visit our website for more information](https://restaurantcollective.org.uk/first-3-months-membership-is-absolutely-free/)
JOIN.joinUsToday:
# Subscribe Now

Just complete the following steps and we’ll have you signed up in no time. 

 1. Provide your name and contact details

 2. Choose a subscription option

 3. Pay online.

If you experience any problems throughout this process please email: 

{{ email }}
JOIN.joinWelcome:
# Welcome

You've successfully registered for **{{ brand }}** and we've sent you login details and along with some further information.

Close this window and check your email.

Many thanks.

**{{ brand }} Curation Team**
JOIN.labelTerms: By ticking this box you agree to the {{ brand }} Terms and Privacy Policy and for **{{ brand }}** to contact you, when necessary, using the details that you have provided here.
JOIN.msgCheckEmail: Check your email for sign in credentials
JOIN.msgManditory: Please complete all of the information.

MARKETPLACE.msgEmailAffiiateRequest:
Your request has been sent.

You Membership details have been sent to {{ affiliate }} and someone from their team should contact you within 2 working days.
MARKETPLACE.msgRequest:
Your contact details and Membership ID will be sent to **{{ affiliate }}** and someone from their team should contact you within 2 working days to discuss the **{{ deal }}** deal.

This is just to register you interest with them and there's no obligation to proceed, unless you should choose to do so.
MARKETPLACE.msgRequestSent: Thank you. Your request has been sent.
MARKETPLACE.tipRequestContact: Someone will contact you about this deal

MEMBERSHIP.infoMembershipMonthly:
##  MONTHLY SUBSCRIPTION

Pay just **{{ fee }} + VAT** per month for full access to all the benefits offered by **{{ brand }}**. 

You will also be charged a one-time set-up fee of **{{ setup }} + VAT**.
MEMBERSHIP.infoMembershipYearly:
## ANNUAL SUBSCRIPTION

Pay **{{ fee }}** per year and you'll get a full 12 month membership for the price of only 10. All the same **{{ brand }}** benefits, just a bit cheaper!
MEMBERSHIP.instructions:
# What do I get?

- Modern design that looks great on any device
- 24/7 Content management
- High performance
- Monthly contract, all inclusive fees
- UK Support

# Coming soon – all the above PLUS:

- Real-time online bookings
- Content distributed to RDL Network of partners
- Content synchronised to Google, Facebook and Instagram
- Online bookings direct from Google, Facebook and Instagram
MEMBERSHIP.msgInvalidStripe: There seems to be a problem with your details. Please use the 'back' button to go back and check your details, or to contact support.
MEMBERSHIP.terms: Please take the time to read the [Terms of Membership]({{ terms }}) and [Privacy Policy]({{ privacy }}). By becoming a subscriber to apptiser you are confirming your acceptance of these terms.

MESSAGES.welcomeNewMember:
# You're in!

It's great that you've chosen to subscribe to apptiser and we hope you enjoy using your website.

## Add your venue

Before you start exploring the Member's Hub, please complete the initial set up by linking your venue to your membership account.

When you're ready, select the **START HERE** option below.

Find your venue and follow the on-screen instructions to verify the details and link it to your subscription.

PLANS.infoCurrentPlanMonthly: Your current subscription plan renews on the **{{ renewal }}** of each month at **{{ price }}**. To change your plan, select another option below and we'll calculate any additional charges due.
PLANS.infoCurrentPlanYearly: Your current subscription plan renews on the **{{ renewal }}** at a total of **{{ price }}**. To change your plan, select another option below and we'll calculate any additional charges due.
PLANS.infoDowngrading: If you choose to go ahead and change your subscription plan to **{{ plan }}** then we’ll credit your account with the difference in subscription fees for this period and from **{{ renewal }}** your new payment will be **{{ price }}**.
PLANS.infoNewPlanMonthly: If you choose to go ahead and change your subscription plan to **{{ plan }}** then we’ll charge you **{{ prorate }}** now – which is prorated for the current billing period – and from **{{ renewal }}** your new monthly subscription will be **{{ price }}**.
PLANS.infoNewPlanYearly: If you choose to change your subscription plan to **{{ plan }}** then we’ll charge you **{{ prorate }}** now –  which is prorated for the current billing period – and from **{{ renewal }}** we’ll bill you at the new yearly subscription fee of **{{ price }}**.
PLANS.msgAddRestaurant: Begin managing your web content and publishing your **Website** that's included with your subscription plan.

SETTINGS.infoAccounts:
Venue that are linked to your account are shown below and you can manage additional venues by simply adding them here.

To view your billing history and payment details, or to download your invoices, select the 'MANAGE PAYMENTS' option above.
SETTINGS.infoAuth: These are the credentials that you'll need to Sign In to the application. Passwords must be at least 8 characters.
SETTINGS.infoAvatar: Click the image add/edit and personalise your account details.
SETTINGS.infoMember: All communications regarding your account will be sent to this email address.
SETTINGS.infoNotification: In addition to essential communications about your {{ brand }}  subscription, you may also choose receive any of the following, by ticking the relevant checkbox:
SETTINGS.infoReferrals: This is a unique referral code that you can share with any of your colleagues, to encourage them to join apptiser and have access to this exciting website solution.
SETTINGS.infoRestaurants:
Venues associated with your account are shown below. Select a venue to add/edit the content and to create/update your **apptiser website**.

Use the ADD option above to create websites and manage the content for additional venues.
SETTINGS.labelAddRestaurant: Add a venue to this account
SETTINGS.msgAddRestaurant_m:
Adding another venue will increase your subscription by **{{ price }}**. 

We'll calculate any additional prorated fees that would be due in this month and charge that to your account automatically – once you've successfully added your venue.

After that, your subscription charge will be **{{ total }} + VAT every month**. Would you like to go ahead and add a venue?
SETTINGS.msgAddRestaurant_y:
Adding another venue will increase your subscription by **{{ price }}** a year.

We'll calculate any additional prorated amount due for this year, based on the time left, and automatically charge that to your account. 

Your new subscription total will then become **{{ total }} plus VAT per year**. **Would you like to continue?**
SETTINGS.msgChangePlanToMonthly:
You are currently on the **{{ plan }}** which renews every year. If you want to switch to a monthly subscription, then please contact support@apptiser.io.

Thank you.
SETTINGS.msgChangePlanToYearly:
You are currently subscribed to **{{ plan }}**. If you would prefer to save some money by switching to a yearly plan then please contact support@apptiser.io.

Many thanks.
SETTINGS.msgContactsUpdated: Your contact details have been updated
SETTINGS.msgLinkCopied: Your referral link has been copied to the clipboard
SETTINGS.msgNewRequestReceived: New request successfully received. Thank you.
SETTINGS.msgNotificationsUpdated: Your notification settings have been updated
SETTINGS.msgPlanUpdated: Your membership plan has been successfully updated to {{ plan }}
SETTINGS.msgRemoveRestaurant: Are you sure that you want to remove **{{ name }}** from your account – you will no longer have access to manage their web content?
SETTINGS.msgRestaurantRemoved:
Your requested changes have been processed.

You can review your updated subscription  fees by selecting the MANAGE PAYMENTS option on **Account Details**.
SETTINGS.msgUpdateFailed: Sorry, there was a problem updating your information

SIGNIN.errorCompany: Sorry, we do not recognise your APPTISER credentials.
SIGNIN.errorCredentials: Sorry, we don't recognise your email or password, please check your details.
SIGNIN.errorEmailUnkown: Sorry, we don't recognise your email or password, please check your details.
SIGNIN.errorInActiveAccount: Sorry, but this account is no longer active.
SIGNIN.errorSystemsOffline: Sorry, but our systems are currently offline.
SIGNIN.errorTechnical: Unfortunately we're experiencing technical issues, please try again later.
SIGNIN.errorUserUnauthorised: Unauthorised login attempt - please check your details
SIGNIN.introduction:
# Websites Made Simple

 **{{ brand }}** offers simplicity, clarity and effective website solution for hospitality businesses.

Welcome to **{{ brand }}**. We know how hard it is to create, maintain and run a website that works hard for you, which is why we created apptiser.
 apptiser takes the uncertainty away from web building. Think of us as the staff member you never knew you needed. Tech guru that works hard for you and who always makes sure to highlight you in the best light possible.
SIGNIN.msgNewMember:
We have sent you a **welcome email** that you should receive in the next couple of minutes – if you don't receive it at first, check your email 'spam', just in case. 

The email includes a system generated password which you'll need to login for the first time:
  
- **Copy the password** & return to this page
- Close this message window by clicking 'OK'
- Paste your password into the form and **Sign In**  

**Thanks for joining us.**
SIGNIN.newPwdSent: A new password has been sent to your email address
SIGNIN.resetPwdInstructions: Enter your registered email address to reset your password. You may need to check your spam folder.
SIGNIN.signInOrJoin:
# Sign in

or [create your **{{ brand }}** account]({{ route }})

VERIFY.infoCode:
Please check the email address for **{{ name }}** and add your Verification Code below.

If you don't have a code yet, then make sure we have the correct email and use **Request Code option**.

Copy the code from your email and paste it back here.
VERIFY.infoEmail:
Please provide the main email address for {{ name }}.

This will be used to confirm Membership and in all future correspondence.
VERIFY.infoEmailAndCode:
Please enter the main email address for **{{ name }}** and then add your **Verification Code** below:.

If you don't have a code yet then once you've added the email address, use the **Request Code** option.

Copy the code from your email and paste it back here.
VERIFY.infoVerify:
Please check that the email address below is correct for **{{ name }}**, then add and submit your **verification code**.

If you don't have a code yet, first make sure that the email is correct, then select the **Request Code** option below and a code will be sent to you.

Once you have your code, return here and complete the process.
VERIFY.msgCodeSent: A verification code has been sent to {{ email }}
